get_site.description: Get a specified site. Note: Environment variable keys and values have moved from build_settings.env and repo.env to a new endpoint. Please use getEnvVars to retrieve site environment variables.

props.name: siteId
props.description: Select the site to retrieve information for

list_files.description: Returns a list of all the files in the current deploy.

props.name: siteId
props.description: Select the site to list files for

list_site_deploys.description: Returns a list of all deploys for a specific site.

props.name: siteId
props.description: Select the site to list deploys for

start_deploy.description: Triggers a new build for a site on Netlify. Supports clearing build cache.

props.name: clearCache
props.description: Whether to clear the build cache before building

new_deploy_failed.description: Fires when a site deploy fails.

props.name: siteId
props.description: Select the site to monitor for failed deploy events

new_deploy_started.description: Fires immediately when a deploy job starts on your Netlify site.

props.name: siteId
props.description: Select the site to monitor for deploy events

new_deploy_succeeded.description: Fires when a new site version has successfully deployed.

props.name: siteId
props.description: Select the site to monitor for successful deploy events

new_form_submission.description: Fires when a Netlify form submission is received.

props.name: siteId
props.description: Select the site to monitor for form submissions
